messages:
Its during the worst times of your life that you will get to see the true colors of the people who say they care for you
#QuoteOfTheDay

Its during the worst times of your life that you will get to see the true colors of the people who say they care for you
#QuoteOfTheDay
In the words of Abraham Lincoln:            I will prepare and some day my chance will come.

Its during the worst times of your life that you will get to see the true colors of the people who say they care for you
